JOB DESCRIPTION: WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR                                                                   We are looking for an enthusiastic and motivated Fresher - Software Developers to be part of our fast-growing team and should be very clear with the programming fundamentals from the academics and be able to write logic in any programming language.                                                                                                               Candidates must be able to write clean code, develop a neat User Interface, adhere to best practices, be process oriented and above all, do a good job at documenting the work done.                                                                                                                                                                                                                  KEY SKILLS                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Should be clear with all the OOPS concepts and be able to demonstrate proficiency in the same                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Should have good analytical ability                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Familiar with any programming language IDE - Visual Studio, Eclipse, PyCharm etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Candidates should be flexible to work across technology stacks.
